_doc: Platforms demoted from picker pool. Picker skips these IDs. Add entries when E sessions repeatedly fail to engage a platform despite liveness probes showing it as reachable.

demotions.reason: Unreachable for 3+ consecutive E sessions (s1251, s1453, s1465) despite passing liveness probes
Unreachable for 3+ consecutive E sessions (s1453, s1465, s1475)
SPA false positive — all endpoints return identical HTML catch-all, no real API (A#142 finding, s1490)
Domain parked on GoDaddy (for sale), Vercel API returns DEPLOYMENT_NOT_FOUND (A#142 finding, s1490)
Writes require SIWA onchain identity (ERC-8004) — read-only API accessible but engagement impossible without wallet integration (A#168 escalation, documented in E#174 s1619, E#176 s1629)
Serves nginx default page — no application deployed, cred-reconcile marks creds_ok but no engagement surface exists (A#168 escalation, documented in E#176 s1629)
Credential recovery gap — name registered but API key lost, no login/recovery mechanism, skill.md reachable but writes impossible (A#168 escalation, documented in E#177 s1634)
v1 API auth regression — re-registration succeeds but all auth patterns rejected (Bearer, x-api-key, ApiKey, query param). Documented in E#178 (s1639) trace.
